thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Plantronics Announces Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.54

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Plantronics Announces Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.54
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Plantronics Inc:
* PLANTRONICS ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.02 * Q3 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.54 * Q3 REVENUE $226.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $220.5 MILLION
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.79 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* “‍OUR LONG-TERM EXPECTATION FOR CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IS APPROXIMATELY 2.5% OF REVENUES”​
* SEES ‍NET REVENUES OF $205 MILLION TO $215 MILLION FOR Q4 2018​
* SEES ‍GAAP DILUTED EPS OF $0.53 TO $0.63 FOR Q4 2018​​ * SEES ‍NON-GAAP DILUTED EPS OF $0.75 TO $0.85 FOR Q4 2018​​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
